name: web_search_api
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool bing_search_apis.
Tool description: An AI service from Microsoft Azure that enables secure, ad-free location search for your users, displaying relevant information from web results, images, local businesses, news and images Photo.
API description: Performs a web search using the Bing search engine API, and returns the search data and suggested keywords.

size.description: The number of search results to return. Defaults to '30'.

keyword.description: The search query keyword. Defaults to 'how-to-use-excel-for-free'.

page.description: The page number of the search results to retrieve. Defaults to '0'.
